Process.name: CO2 + hv ->CO + O(3S)
Process.Notes: Adapted nm -> eV, Pure data (no Torr adaptation)

Process.name: CO2 + ph -> 1. x O(1D)
Process.Notes: Slanger 74 converted to ratio. ratio used with amop total cross section

Process.name: CO2 + ph -> 1. x O(1S)
Process.Notes: Adapted nm -> eV, Uncertainty in Lawrence: pb photodissciation ratio. Correction near ly alpha

CO2 + hv -> CO+ + O
